original_text: Then Joshua and all Israel with him moved on from Makkedah to Libnah and attacked it.
korean_text: 여호수아가 온 이스라엘과 더불어 막게다에서 립나로 나아가서 립나와 싸우매

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua and all Israel with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호수아와 그와 함께 한 온 이스라엘은

sentences.original_text: moved on from Makkedah to Libnah
